author: Special Correspondent
text:
The modernised suits at Sea Gulls premises on the shores of the beach was declared open on Wednesday.

Originally constructed to house shopping complex, the Sea Gulls premises did not attract traders as it was located about 5 km from the town. Hence the Union Territory decided to re-design the structure into suits.

N. Rangasamy, Chief Minister of Puducherry, declared open the suits at a function held on Wednesday. The work, which was taken up last May was completed last month. He declared open the Children’s Park which was renovated at an expenditure of Rs. 10 lakh.

Mr. Rangasamy inspected the bridge built in Tirumalairajanpattinam before throwing it open to traffic.

Ministers P. R. Siva and M. Chandracasu and E. Vallavan, District Collector accompanied the Chief Minister.
title: Redesigned suits inaugurated at Sea Gulls
